description: Restores a graph from a snapshot.

parameters.name: snapshotIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the snapshot in question.

parameters.name: graphName
parameters.description: A name for the new Neptune Analytics graph to be created from the snapshot. The name must contain from 1 to 63 letters, numbers, or hyphens, and its first character must be a letter. It cannot end with a hyphen or contain two consecutive hyphens. Only lowercase letters are allowed.

parameters.name: provisionedMemory
parameters.description: The provisioned memory-optimized Neptune Capacity Units (m-NCUs) to use for the graph. Min = 16

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Adds metadata tags to the snapshot. These tags can also be used with cost allocation reporting, or used in a Condition statement in an IAM policy. (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: replicaCount
parameters.description: The number of replicas in other AZs. Min =0, Max = 2, Default =1

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the graph.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN associated with the graph.

nested_items.name: statusReason
nested_items.description: The reason that the graph has this status.

nested_items.name: createTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the graph was created.

nested_items.name: provisionedMemory
nested_items.description: The number of memory-optimized Neptune Capacity Units (m-NCUs) allocated to the graph.

nested_items.name: publicConnectivity
nested_items.description: If true, the graph has a public endpoint, otherwise not.

nested_items.name: vectorSearchConfiguration
nested_items.description: Specifies the number of dimensions for vector embeddings loaded into the graph. Max = 65535

nested_items.name: replicaCount
nested_items.description: The number of replicas for the graph.

nested_items.name: kmsKeyIdentifier
nested_items.description: The ID of the KMS key used to encrypt and decrypt graph data.

nested_items.name: sourceSnapshotId
nested_items.description: The ID of the snapshot from which the graph was created, if any.

nested_items.name: deletionProtection
nested_items.description: If true, deletion protection is enabled for the graph.

nested_items.name: buildNumber
nested_items.description: The build number of the graph.
